name: A Dragon's Tale
description:
"A Dragon's Tale" is my first published indie game. It is about a small dragon whose island was invaded by a powerful ghost. In order to save your parents and free your island, you have to travel to the volcano to defeat the ghost. On your way, you encounter puzzles and enemies and get to see many different parts of the island in over 10 chapters. You will find stars, which you can use to unlock over 30 skills, upgrades and attacks.

Stats and Details:

  • ⌛️ 3 - 4 hours playtime
  • 📖 11 unique chapters with their own features, visuals and music
  • 🧩 Many puzzles to solve
  • ⭐ 32 abilities to unlock and upgrade
  • 💎 Lots of secrets to discover
  • 💀 Many different enemies and difficult boss battles

⌨️ Controls

  • Movement: A, D (←, →)
  • Swimming: WASD (Arrow Keys)
  • Jump: Space Bar

A lot of abilities can be unlocked in the game, the controls for those can be found in the pause menu!

🎮 This game supports controller input

🎵 Soundtrack was composed by Jonas Kopetzky
